## Add Subgraph collections to our Benchmark
This repository provides instructions on how to set up and use **HO-GDB** for benchmarking with Neo4j.

---

##  Prerequisites

- Python 3.9+
- Jupyter Notebook
- Neo4j database (running and accessible)
- Git

---

## Installation

Clone and install the [HO-GDB package](https://github.com/spcl/HO-GDB/tree/main):

```bash
git clone https://github.com/spcl/HO-GDB.git
cd HO-GDB
```
---

## Add subgraph collections

Run the notebook Add_subgraph_nodes.ipynb

---

## Query the Graph

To execute queries and inspect results, navigate to: [`/_6_Queries_&_Results`](./_6_Queries_&_Results)
